definitions.definition: A multiply folded piece of cloth , a pouch of ice , etc., used to apply to a patient's skin, cover the dressing of wounds, and placed with the aid of a bandage to apply pressure on an injury.
examples: He held a cold compress over the sprain.

main_definition: ( medicine ) A multiply folded piece of cloth , a pouch of ice , etc., used to apply to a patient's skin, cover the dressing of wounds, and placed with the aid of a bandage to apply pressure on an injury.
